last-updated: "Auto-updated weekly"

## Overview

This website provides an automatically updated list of publications from members of our research network. Publication data is sourced directly from [ORCID](https://orcid.org) profiles and updated weekly via GitHub Actions.

Publications are automatically classified to identify those related to the **Scholarship of Teaching and Learning (SoTL)** and education research.
 
::: {.callout-note}
## Current Statistics

- **40** network members
- **587** unique publications
- **185** SoTL/education publications (31.5%)
- **Last updated:** 2026-01-29 21:04:02 GMT
:::

## Recent Publications

The most recent publications from network members:

- [Clinical‐year veterinary students are most likely to be confident and competent in calving procedures after blending simulator practicals with videos](https://doi.org/10.1002/vetr.5774) (2026). *Veterinary Record*.
- Incoporating GenAI into critical appraisal undergraduate medical education summative coursework (2026). *NADEGS 2025*.
- [Lecture capture as Universal Design for Learning: a post-pandemic scoping review](https://doi.org/10.1016/j.cophys.2025.100896) (2026). *Current Opinion in Physiology*.
- [Preparing Students to Care for Socially Excluded Patients: A Qualitative Study of Inclusion Health in Undergraduate Medical Education](https://doi.org/10.1111/tct.70277) (2026). *The Clinical Teacher*.
- [A manifesto for plant science education](https://doi.org/10.1002/ppp3.70115) (2025). *PLANTS, PEOPLE, PLANET*.
- [A qualitative exploration of older people’s experience of discharge from mental health inpatient settings](https://doi.org/10.1080/17482631.2025.2581398) (2025). *International Journal of Qualitative Studies on Health and Well-being*.
- A qualitative study exploring the role of perfectionism in trichotillomania (2025). *Psychology and Psychotherapy: Theory, Research and Practice*.
- [A qualitative study exploring the role of perfectionism in trichotillomania](https://doi.org/10.1111/papt.12597) (2025). *Psychology and Psychotherapy: Theory, Research and Practice*.
- Acknowledging the Missing Voices of Marginalised Students in Higher Education, Beyond Box-Ticking Frameworks: Ensuring Successful Outcomes for All. Ensuring Successful Outcomes for All (2025).
- [Advancing Competency Development in Global Mental Health: A Call for Contextualised, Collaborative and Future-Oriented Approaches](https://doi.org/10.64257/vnybxf92) (2025). *Mental Health Open*.
